successes.title: The Lomography New Petzval 58 Bokeh Control Art Lens
successes.description: Swirl to Freedom with the World’s First Petzval Bokeh Control Lens.

Pledges.description: Thanks for the love! Get an LC-A+ Keychain to show off your support.
Get an LC-A+ Keychain, Fotoclips and a Lomo Notebook as a token of our appreciation.

SUPER EARLY BIRD LAUNCH DEAL:
Get a New Petzval 58 Bokeh Control Brass Lens from the very first batch!

PETZVAL BRASS BUNDLE:
Get the New Petzval 58 Bokeh Control Brass Lens AND the New Petzval 85 Portrait Brass Lens for unlimited Petzval potential!
Please check our Frequently Asked Questions section for more information about the New Petzval 85 Portrait Brass Lens.

Get the New Petzval 58 Bokeh Control Black Lens AND the New Petzval 85 Portrait Black Lens for unlimited Petzval potential!
Please check our Frequently Asked Questions section for more information about the New Petzval 85 Portrait Brass Lens.

Please check our Frequently Asked Questions section for more information about the LOMO LC-A+.

DOUBLE UP BUNDLE:
Get TWO New Petzval 58 Bokeh Control Brass Lenses.

DOUBLE UP BUNDLE:
Get one New Petzval 58 Bokeh Control Brass Lens and one New Petzval 58 Bokeh Control Black Lens.

LOMOGRAPHY KICKSTARTER BUNDLE:
Get a New Petzval 58 Bokeh Control Brass Lens, a New Petzval 85 Portrait Brass Lens, a Lomo'Instant Sanremo & Lenses, and a Lomography Smartphone Film Scanner — one each from all of our Kickstarter campaigns!

DOUBLE UP BUNDLE:

ART LENS LOVERS BUNDLE:
Get a New Petzval 58 Bokeh Control Brass Lens, a New Petzval 85 Portrait Brass Lens, a Lomo LC-A Minitar-1 Lens, and a New Russar+ Lens — one each from our luxurious Lomography Art Lens Family!
